turns.ai_line: Doctor, I dey feel this heavy pain for my belle after I chop leftover rice wey don stay for house. The food no dey smell bad o, but e been dey for house for some days. I dey live for area wey heat too much and food fit spoil quick quick. I don dey purge and I dey feel like I wan vomit. I no fit bear this pain again o.
turns.user_input: What did you eat? Did you drink water? Okay.

turns.ai_line: Doctor, I go like make you check me well well. I no wan make e be say na something bad dey worry me. You fit sabi wetin dey cause this wahala? I go fit do anything to make am stop.
turns.user_input: Yes, if you've been having nausea and porjing, then it might mean you have stomach porjing.

turns.ai_line: Doctor, abeg, I dey serious. The pain wey I dey feel no be small thing. Again, I go like know if na the rice wey I chop yesterday cause am. I bin store the rice for fridge but as I chop am, my belle just dey do me somehow. E dey pain me well well and I dey purge. I no fit sleep sef. Wetin you think say fit cause am?
